00030 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00031 
00032 typedef struct {
00033   CGFloat red;
00034   CGFloat green;
00035   CGFloat blue;
00036   CGFloat alpha;
00037 } GH_RGBA;
00038 
00039 // HSV is the same as HSB
00040 typedef struct {
00041   float hue;
00042   float saturation;
00043   float value;
00044 } GH_HSV;
00045 
00046 
00051 @interface UIColor (GHUtils)
00052 
00053 - (GH_RGBA)gh_rgba;
00054 
00055 - (GH_HSV)gh_hsv;
00056 
00057 - (GH_HSV)gh_hsvFromRed:(CGFloat)red green:(CGFloat)green blue:(CGFloat)blue;
00058 
00059 // See NSColor#getComponents:
00060 - (void)gh_getComponents:(CGFloat *)components;
00061 
00062 // See NSColor#numberOfComponents
00063 - (NSInteger)gh_numberOfComponents;
00064 
00065 // See NSColor#getRed:green:blue:alpha
00066 - (void)gh_getRed:(CGFloat *)red green:(CGFloat *)green blue:(CGFloat *)blue alpha:(CGFloat *)alpha;
00067 
00068 @end
